Have a good day!

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Automotive, Aircraft & Boat Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

data.text: @ruhi_hi Hi! The mobile boarding card is available for most destinations. If the airport does not support it, then you'll need to print out your boarding card. You can check mobile card availability here: https://t.co/u2lPzQk3B1.

@only_forever_dl Hi there! Unfortunately it is not possible to change name while you have active membership.
Have a good day!

@Monipop84 @AeroportoNapoli Hi! We are sorry to hear about this. If you lost items on board, please contact the Lost & Found desks at both departure and arrival airports. If our cabin crew finds any items, they will leave them at one of the two airports. We hope you will be reunited with your belongings!

@DailyTalie_ Hi Talie, we are sorry it is taking this long. But, becuase of the high season we got more claims than expected so it's taking our agents longer than expected to get back to customers. Thank you for understanding.
@lucaprivitera95 Hi Luca, you need to check the airport website for such information. Have a safe flight!

data.text: @macarenapick Hi there, there will be a cancellation fee. Please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre for more questions: https://t.co/4KXMx8pBhX.

@InvestorVik Hi there, we are sorry to hear that. Due to the high season, we got more claims than expected so it's taking our team more than 30 days to get back customers' claims. Thank you for understanding.

data.text:
Bulgarian Bargain 🇧🇬 - a promo classic by WIZZ ✈️
We can't tell you what to do. But what we can do is tell you that today you can get 20% off on 450,000 seats to or from Bulgaria on selected flights. Grab yours today and travel until 14 December 2022! 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOKuvd https://t.co/uw7OMmpH6S

data.text: @pitto Hi Blank, please use the mobile app or our website from a computer not from a mobile. If you do not want to book seats then you can check in only 48 hours before flight time. Please contact us via the Live Chat for more questions: https://t.co/4KXMx8q97v.

@AmerBegovic5 Hi Amer! As an airline, we require only a valid travel document (ID card or Passport) and the Boarding Pass. We recommend you contact the embassy or other local authorities of your destination country to check if they require any additional documents. Thank you!

@M4XM4X21 Hi Max! Please be informed that our colleagues have 30 days to respond to the claims. We kindly ask for your patience in the meantime. You will receive an answer via email soon. Thank you for your cooperation!

data.text:
@H08465413 @Amyycak3s You can convert the credits to cash as long as you haven't spent any of them and your original payment method was card or bank transfer.
Please find the link to the WIZZ credit conversion request here: https://t.co/mCcVBnIWJu

data.text: @millie03357061 Hi Mele. If you need help with anything then please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre: https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK

@H08465413 @Amyycak3s Hi Helena. To be able to use your Wizz Credits 1. you need to log in to your account 2. the account holder has to be the first passenger all times 3. there can be a total of 6 passengers only 4. there can't be any third party services included. Thank you
@aniatosupergirl Hi. You need to check the extra seat in with your own details. Just change the last character of your travel document number, so it won't be a duplicate. Thank you

data.text: @jegoddard1 Hi Jessica! We apologize that you felt that WIZZ let you down on this occasion. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8YEtg.

data.text: @benalexryder Hi There! We apologize that you felt that WIZZ let you down on this occasion. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint claim via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8YEtg.

data.text: @Prasun6official Hi Prasun! We apologize for the process taking longer than expected. Please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre and we will assist you as soon as possible: https://t.co/y2HzLdDlzJ. Thank you for your cooperation.
@pigletruth Hi Ruthi! Please go to the check-in desk at the airport. Our colleagues will assist you at the airport and give you a valid boarding pass. Thank you for your cooperation.

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: @mirakuloes Hi There! You can check our website for the restricted items and limits for the liquid carriage allowance: https://t.co/0m2znkl9Si. You should also check the regulations of the airport, due to the security screening procedure. Thank you for your cooperation.

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: @michal_prochon Hi Michal! Please accept our sincere apologies for the delay in the process. Please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre and we will assist you as soon as possible: https://t.co/y2HzLdDTph.

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: @inimma79 Hi There! You can only take the helmet if it fits to the cabin baggage size. Here you can find the details of the baggage: https://t.co/BhMebYFYTq. We suggest you follow strictly the rules regarding baggage sizes to avoid extra costs. Thank you for your cooperation!

@MikkelBondeDK Hi Mikkel! We are sorry to hear that. But we have not experienced a malfunction with the website. Please clear your cookies, cache, and browser history and try again or use our mobile app. After the steps, it will be working. Thank you for your cooperation!

@ANDY___73 Hi Andy! If you do not use the machine during the flight, taking it with you on board is okay. If it fits in your backpack, you can put it in and take it to the board. You need a "Fit the Fly" form and a medical letter about the machine. Please contact us via Live Chat as well.
@BMoldovicean Hi there, you can take the return flight without taking the outbound one. You do not have to check in for the second flight if you are not taking it. Have a safe flight!

We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you to submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8Y6DI.

data.text: @x_Lex3 @WizzAirUK @WizzAirUK_W9 Hi, we're sorry to hear about that. Please go to the Lost&Found desk in the arrivals transit area and fill in a report.Keep the reference number and get in touch with our Customer Relations team: https://t.co/EcxQR14KnL. Our team will do their best to help you find the luggage!
